content: try out this flower pattern link to youtube video https //youtu be/2umpc5yjccq skill level easy the pattern does involve sewing the pieces together format pdf and video stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet front loop back loop tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn -orange green brown and pink -yarn needle -scissors -stuffing final size - height 8 cm and width 8 cm
